title: Pandals / Shamiyanas - means a temporary structure with roof or walls made of canvas, cloth other like material which is not adopted for permanent or continuous occupancy
clause_text: Pandals / Shamiyanas - means a temporary structure with roof or walls made of canvas, cloth other like material which is not adopted for permanent or continuous occupancy.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
